systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource

location.Description: The Azure location where the Confidential Ledger is running.

ledgerName.Description: Unique name for the Confidential Ledger.

ledgerStorageAccount.Description: Name of the Blob Storage Account for saving ledger files

aadBasedSecurityPrincipals.Description: Array of all AAD based Security Principals.

certBasedSecurityPrincipals.Description: Array of all cert based Security Principals.

principalId.Description: UUID/GUID based Principal Id of the Security Principal

tenantId.Description: UUID/GUID based Tenant Id of the Security Principal

ledgerRoleName.Description: LedgerRole associated with the Security Principal of Ledger

cert.Description: Public key of the user cert (.pem or .cer)

ledgerRoleName.Description: LedgerRole associated with the Security Principal of Ledger

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
